Pakistan Demographic and Health Survey 1990-91 Men's Recode Data

Source: R/PKMR21.R
PKMR21.Rd

PKMR21 data of Men's Recode from Pakistan Demographic and Health Survey 1990-91.

Examples

load("PKMR21")
#> Warning: cannot open compressed file 'PKMR21', probable reason 'No such file or directory'
#> Error in readChar(con, 5L, useBytes = TRUE): cannot open the connection
